revision.text: Possibly: A grammar of the French tongue, with a prefatory discourse, containing an essay On the Proper Method for teaching and learning that language. By Lewis Chambaud. (London : printed for C. Bathurst, W. Strahan, J. and F. Rivington, J. Hinton, Hawes and Co. S. Crowder, B. Law, T. Longman, J. Wilkie, G. Robinson, T. Becket, T. Cadell, P. Elmsley, and E.
